Package controller

Class ListAppointments

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ListAppointments
  • public class ListAppointments
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Controller for the ListAppointments.fxml form. It is responsible for pulling, creating, updating, deleting appointment data from the database.

      The appoinmentAllSelected method is for filtering appoinment data using a radio button.
      void appointmentListener​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      The appointmentListener method waits for a mouse click event in the appointmentTable, and when an item is pressed it populates the TextFields and ComboBox with the appropriate data.

      The appoinmentMonthSelected method is for filtering appoinment data using a radio button.

      When the back button is pressed it will take the user back to the main menu.
      void onDeleteAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When the delete button is pressed this method is called and the selected item from the table will be deleted from the Appointments table.
      void onUpdateAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When the Update button is pressed this method is called his method only works if the customerListener method has has been called.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        initialize pulls data from that database and set's the items in the table. I use Lambda expression to populate the Contact ComboBox. There is an alert that is displayed if there is no items from the database to populate the table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • appointmentWeekSelected

        public void appointmentWeekSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        The appoinmentWeekSelected method is for filtering appoinment data using a radio button. It's primary responsibility is to display only appointments scheduled for the current week. There is a lambda expression to make this possible.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        public void appointmentMonthSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        The appoinmentMonthSelected method is for filtering appoinment data using a radio button. It's primary responsibility is to display only appointments scheduled for the current Month. There is a lambda expression to make this possible.

      • appointmentAllSelected

        public void appointmentAllSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        The appoinmentAllSelected method is for filtering appoinment data using a radio button. It's primary responsibility is to display all appointments and it is the default radio button selected.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • onAddAppointment

        public void onAddAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        When the Add button is pressed this method is called which will take data from the textfields and add it to the database. This is done by calling the AppointmentsQuery insertAppointment() method. We also convert the Timezone.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • onDeleteAppointment

        public void onDeleteAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        When the delete button is pressed this method is called and the selected item from the table will be deleted from the Appointments table. This is done by calling the AppointmentsQuery delete() method.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • onBackButton

        public void onBackButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        When the back button is pressed it will take the user back to the main menu.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • onUpdateAppointment

        public void onUpdateAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        When the Update button is pressed this method is called his method only works if the customerListener method has has been called. It will call AppointmentsQuery update() method which will update the data in the database. We also convert the Timezone.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • appointmentListener

        public void appointmentListener​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        The appointmentListener method waits for a mouse click event in the appointmentTable, and when an item is pressed it populates the TextFields and ComboBox with the appropriate data. I use lambda expressions for Contact ComboBox.
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent -
